activities: Kin is a web-based application which manages general employee data and files, such as addresses and employment contracts.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: For organization human resources data we will use the EU data protection authorities and the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner; for all other data we will use TRUSTe.
